import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useJobs } from '../../contexts/JobsContext'; export default function EmployerJobs() { const { addJob } = useJobs(); const [form, setForm] = useState({ title: '', category: '', type: '', status: '', summary: '', responsibilities: '', requirements: '', preferred: '', salary: '', benefits: '', location: '', workArrangement: 'remote', deadline: '', howToApply: '' }); const onChange = (e) => setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); function onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault?.(); addJob(form); // reset form after posting setForm({ title: '', category: '', type: '', status: '', summary: '', responsibilities: '', requirements: '', preferred: '', salary: '', benefits: '', location: '', workArrangement: 'remote', deadline: '', howToApply: '' }); } return (
